name: papi
description: WordPress Page Type API with custom fields
author: Fredrik Forsmo <fredrik.forsmo@gmail.com>

scripts.css:
sass src/assets/scss/style.scss dist/css/style.css && autoprefixer-cli -b "last 2 version" dist/css/style.css dist/css/style.css && csso dist/css/style.css dist/css/style.min.css && echo "
/*# sourceMappingURL=style.min.css.map */" >> dist/css/style.min.css && mv dist/css/style.css.map dist/css/style.min.css.map && rm dist/css/style.css
